Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 89th/Commercial
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 89th, Houston, 87th and Commercial due to, street blockage near 89th/Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 89th, Houston, 87th and Commercial due to, street blockage near 89th/Commercial.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green, Midway-bound Orange Line Service Delayed near Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green, Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green, Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to signal problems.

At this time please consider using other service alternatives that better serve your trip such as nearby bus routes or buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
